name: I Want to Write a Poem
name_original: I Want to Write a Poem
description:
My first ever game I created on Twine!

---

You're bored.

For Secret Santa, your most unimaginative partner had gifted you a plain notebook. 

You open it and a blank page yawns in front of you, begging to be filled.

---

HOW TO PLAY:

This is an interactive poetry writing prompt. 

All you need is a pen, paper, and a huge imagination.

I recommend that you write along as the story unfolds. 

Don't worry about strictly following the instructions/suggestions.
Feel free to skip or add your own ideas.
